{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01631v1", "title": "Constructive Decompositions of the Identity for Functional John
  Ellipsoids", "summary": "We consider functional ellipsoids in the sense defined by Ivanov and
Nasz\'odi and we study the problem of constructing a decomposition of the
identity similar to the one given by Fritz John in his fundamental theorem.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA,math.DG", "published": "2025-04-02T11:37:07Z"}
